name: Knight Light (RobertW)
description:
Game Info:

Dungeon Crawler where you control a Knight for combat and a Light for navigation.

Controls:

  • ↑←↓→ / WASD - Move Knight
  • Mouse - Move Light
  • Space - Confirm upgrade choice


Thank you for playing! :)
